name: Brick Away
description:
BRICK AWAY!

  • Launch balls and destroy increasingly tough bricks.
  • Collect and use special powerups to your advantage!
  • Face special bricks as you progress!

Instructions:

Click and drag to launch the balls.

Collecting a white ball gives you an additional ball to fire.

Powerups can be collected and activated for special effects.

This is an early work-in-progress prototype. Feel free to leave comments or thoughts below, I appreciate any and all feedback :)

Planned updates include:

  • Actual graphics!
  • Sound effects & music!
  • Particle effects and general polish/tweaking!

Heavily inspired by Disc Brick (iOS/Android).
